record.title: AMENDING SENATE RESOLUTION 458

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate now proceed to consideration of S. Res. 238, which was submitted earlier today.

record.chair: The clerk will report the resolution by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the resolution be agreed to and the motion to reconsider be laid on the table.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
